an6.22:4.1: “Chayime, bhikkhave, aparihāniye dhamme desessāmi, taṃ suṇātha … pe …
an6.22:4.2: katame ca, bhikkhave, cha aparihāniyā dhammā?
an6.22:4.3: Na kammārāmatā, na bhassārāmatā, na niddārāmatā, na saṅgaṇikārāmatā, sovacassatā, kalyāṇamittatā—
an6.22:4.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha aparihāniyā dhammā.
an6.22:5.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atītamaddhānaṃ na parihāyiṃsu kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihāyiṃsu kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.22:5.2: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṃ na parihāyissanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihāyissanti kusalehi dhammehi.
an6.22:5.3: Yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi na parihāyanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihāyanti kusalehi dhammehī”ti.
